metadata.title: CVE-2020-35513 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: A flaw incorrect umask during file or directory modification in the Linuxkernel NFS (network file system) functionality was found in the way usercreate and delete object using NFSv4.2 or newer if both simultaneouslyaccessing the NFS by the other process that is not using new NFSv4.2. Auser with access to the NFS could use this flaw to starve the resourcescausing denial of service.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'was needs-triage ESM criteria').
